data.title: Antz | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase Antz on digital and stream instantly or download offline. A small worker ant named Z dreams of winning the heart of the beautiful Princess Bala so he convinces his soldier ant buddy to switch places with him.  Once the most insignificant of workers, Z may turn out to be the biggest little hero of them all!  With a superstar cast including Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman, Sylvester Stallone and Woody Allen, everyone will dig this spectacular comedy adventure.
data.text:
“Antz” is a fun movie for adults and for children, but occasionally lacks originality. The animation is definitely fine, but still nothing compared to what Disney can and has done.

October 5, 2023

[Antz is] a bizarre, tonally dissonant mess of a movie. Apparently we were willing to overlook such issues 22 years ago.

March 27, 2020

In a world of cookie-cutter movies at least it tries a bunch of weird stuff.

March 12, 2019

Amid all the ingenuity and smartness, the work fails to move and contains little wonderment - ironically appropriating the zealous industry of its on-screen ants.

December 2, 2018

It's the noble attempt by the doomed PDI to announce its worthiness to the world

July 29, 2018

Kids may be puzzled by rebellious worker ants chanting Marxist slogans, but their parental guides may welcome the relief from the prevailing blandness of family films.

August 15, 2017

The artwork is spectacular, vocal performances uniformly capable and the jokes appealing to both adults and children.

June 21, 2017
